[Listen] Black Tiger Sex Machine Shares Full Futuristic Thriller Tour Live Show

Posted by Brittany Prevost on March 24, 2020

On Friday, December 20, 2019, we had the opportunity to cover the official launch of Black Tiger Sex Machine's Futuristic Thriller Tour in their hometown of Montreal, Quebec. For our complete event review, follow this link. Due to the ongoing coronavirus pandemic, the Canadian trio was forced to cancel the remainder of their acclaimed tour. As a result, the Kannibalen Records label heads were left feeling, seemingly, just as heartbroken as their dedicated fans. In the spirit of continuing to spread positivity during this difficult time, the group has given their followers a very special gift! Patrick Barry, Marc-André Chagnon and Julien Maranda, the artists behind BTSM, have released the full audio from their Futuristic Thriller Tour live show. Since its upload, fans have flocked to express their sincerest thanks and appreciation. Although it will never come close to the movie experience party goers get to live in person, it follows as a close second. At this point, we'll take all that we can get, especially when it comes to their undeniably impressive set and unique concept! Check out the full audio and official tracklist below! As BTSM said, "Sit back and press play:

The year is 2058. Naomi, one of the last Connected Fighters of the BTSM Church, is about to face the gruesome power of a Kannibalen AI Zombie."

As an added bonus, Blanke has shared one of his full performances from a tour stop in Des Moine, Iowa. The just over hour set features a bunch of edits by the Australia-raised artist, including Porter Robinson vs Zomboy's 'Say My End Game', San Holo x Jaron x Eptic x Excision's 'Lift Me From The Power', and many more. In addition, the skilled producer played various bass anthems directly supporting Kompany, Wooli, Space Laces, and that's just to name a few. As the cherry on top, Blanke expertly dropped numerous IDs, leaving fans eagerly anticipating the official release dates. Give it a listen below!
